void enableAnimation (bool enable)
 Enable the show/hide animation.

Detailed Description

From your page, you can retrieve an instance of Footer by calling ActionBar.getFooter().

In the portrait mode, the Footer is at the bottom of Page. In the landscape mode, the Footer is at the right of Page.

The following example demonstrates how to use the Footer

 #include <com/gaia/R.h>

 Scene* mpScene = Scene::SceneFactory(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 ActionBar* mpActionBar = getActionBar();

 //get Footer using ActionBar.getFooter
 Footer* mpFooter = mpActionBar->getFooter();

 FooterButton* mpButton = new FooterButton(static_cast<Page*>(this));
 mpButton->setText("Hello");

 Drawer* mpDrawer = mpScene->getResources()->getDrawer(com::gaia::R::drawable::btn_search);
 mpButton->setIcon(mpDrawer);

 mpFooter->addWidget(mpButton);
See also:
ActionBar
FooterButton

Enable the show/hide animation.
